wikipedia_page.main: John Dyer is a former Welsh cyclist from the Rhondda, Wales. He represented Wales at the 1966 Commonwealth Games in Kingston, Jamaica, riding the Scratch Race, Kilo and Sprint events.

response: John Dyer (1699–1757) was a painter and Welsh poet.
John Dyer may also refer to:
*John Dyer (rugby union) (born 1992), Fijian rugby union player
*John Dyer (14th-century MP), cloth merchant and member of the Parliament of England
*John Dyer Baizley, American musician and poet
